channel.title: Posts on Angela's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Angela's Blog

item.title: 2021 Recap
item.description: Merry Christmas! 2021 went by so fast that I completely neglected this blog for half the year, haha.

item.title: Books I Read in April 2021
item.description: A long overdue review of the 5 books I read last month.

item.title: Ancient Deer of the Pleistocene Epoch
item.description: In case you ever needed an excuse to look at pictures of giant antlers!

item.title: 5 Common Backyard Birds in Northern California
item.description: Spring is underway and I’ve been enjoying listening to birdsong and spotting birds out my window, and I’ve also become more and more interested in being able to identify these little critters.

item.title: Books I read in March 2021
item.description: Like a lot of people, I was a really avid reader in elementary and early middle school, but my reading sort of just fell off a cliff in middle/high school as I became more and more preoccupied with much more important things, like zoning out in class and collecting half-used pens.

item.title: Notion school dashboard template
item.description: A simple school dashboard template with a stellar twist!

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: Hi, I’m Angela! This is my new blog where I plan to post about whatever’s on my mind, as well as things I’m working on.
